about_the_game:
The largest Necromancer convention of the year is finally here! Enter the gates and confront your rivals, there are souls to be won!

In Soul Trader, each run starts with you choosing which two minions you wish to bring with you on your journey.

Will you pick Mushi, your old study assistant and master of poison? Or will you go with your newest creation, Mike the hungry abomination? Perhaps Reginald the noble ghost is more your style.

Select from six minions, each with 10+ unique cards that they can acquire, allowing for unique synergies between your party members as you build your deck throughout your run.

See the wondrous sights of NecronomiCon! There are several unique areas for you to explore, each with their own unique events and enemies.

Will you journey through the winding streets of Goblin Town? Perhaps you’ll trade with the local vendors at the Mushroom Stalls, or spend a quiet moment with the ghosts and ghouls of the Graveyard.

Each run will see you going through multiple areas, with each region you explore becoming progressively more difficult as you reach towards your eventual destination!

You are not the only necromancer at NecronomiCon: there are many individuals passing through the event with their own motives. Choose to come face to face with some of these notable attendees in unique runs!

Reunite with Nemesis – your old school rival! Visit the shadowy Soul Grader, a collector of unique and powerful souls. Keep tabs on “Freddy the Terrible”, a not-so-subtle spy for the detestable “Army of Light”.

Each run, you will choose one rival to track down and interact with. Defeating your foe will reward you with a new minion that can be used on all future runs!
